title: Leeds Screendance Competition
screenings: Everyman Screen 4, Fri 8 Nov 20:30 & Mon 11 Nov 12:15
info: 12 short films | Canada, Denmark, Estonia, France, Lebanon, USA | 2023/24 | 67 minutes + 30 minutes for panel on 8 Nov
description: Celebrating its 10th anniversary, LIFFâ€™s Screendance competition spotlights international dance films that navigate the countless ways a moving body can drive a narrative: from the softness of a solo male negotiating his brutalist urban location to the eco-rage of a solo woman battling an underwater plastic-waste monster. Whether explicitly narrative or more abstract in perspective, these innovative shorts all share a particular engagement with choreography, offering an alternative take on this experimental form. A panel discussion with filmmakers will follow the screening on 8 November.
